item.title: Virtualbox:First Steps After Install Ubuntu
item.description: If you are installing ubuntu, always install with “skip unattended” checkmarked. Otherwise, you won’t have terminal access and no sudo. Have the new VM with ubuntu in running state and open terminal in the running VM To enable copy-paste: sudo apt update Devices -> Insert Guest Additions CD image Devices -> Shared Clipboard -> choose Bidirectional Devices -> Drag and Drop -> choose Bidirectional sudo apt install build-essential create some directories to mount the disk inserted in step 2: sudo mkdir /mnt/cdrom this will create a directory called cdrom in mnt sudo mount /dev/cdrom /mnt/cdrom this will mount the /dev/cdrom onto the new directory we created cd /mnt/cdrom ls sudo sh .
